StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_CountPooleesPastPADD]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID int, @PooleesPastPADD int OUTPUT AS
SELECT @PooleesPastPADD = COUNT(C.CONTRACT_ID) FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP RSS INNER JOIN NWA N ON (RSS.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID AND RSS.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID) INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON (N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID AND DATEDIFF(DAY, C.PROJECTED_SHIP_DATE, GETDATE()) > 0 AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, GETDATE()) <= 15) INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = (SELECT MAX(CS2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS CS2 WHERE CS2.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID) AND CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'E' AND CS.STATUS_CODE = 'B' AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'K')
